mapper.insert: insert into addressbooks (addressbook_no, addressbook_type, addressbook_name) values (addressbook_no_seq.nextval, #{type}, #{addressbookName})
mapper.update: update addressbooks set addressbook_type = #{type}, addressbook_name = #{name}, addressbook_deleted = #{deleted}, addressbook_updated_date = sysdate where addressbook_no = #{addressbookNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from addressbooks where addressbook_type = 'public' and addressbook_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from addressbooks where addressbook_type = 'private' and addressbook_deleted = 'N'
select addressbook_type as type, addressbook_name as addressbookName from addressbooks where addressbook_no = #{value}
select addressbook_type as type, addressbook_no as no from addressbooks where addressbook_name = #{value}
select addressbook_no as no, addressbook_name as addressbookName from addressbooks where addressbook_deleted = 'N' and addressbook_type = #{value}
